column2: 75 or over Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Caregiver) $5$4$3$MY WIFE HAS A CHRONIC SACRO-ILLIAC PAIN AND THE FENTANYL PATCH IS THE ONLY TREATMENT THAT SEEMS TO WORK FOR HER.  HOWEVER THE COST OF THE BRAND NAME PATCH IS PROHIBITIVE SO I MUST FIND A LESS-EXPENSIVE GENERIC PATCH.
